title: I... don’t understand the champion choices for the new Star Guardian skins?
body:
Xayah and Rakan being the legendaries, the fact that they’re all Vastayan like champs for Ahri’s old team and the fact that **Zoe** is the evil character, a character who is more chaotic neutral.

They had plenty of ‘villain’ choices, Morgana, Leblanc, Evelynn or even Lissandra. But you know, Zoe had to be the one. 

Ahri’s old team also feels just odd. They’re supposed to be corrupted except for Neeko who escaped, I get that, story wise it’s great. Skin wise, something just feels off, the execution isn’t there. The fact that Miss Fortune was also the only human on their team also feels odd, there isn’t much diversity of character selections.

I loved Star Guardians and the whole lore, but this seasons execution just isn’t right. I **main** 3 out of 4 of the selected Star Guardians, and even I’m contemplating not buying these (maybe Neeko is the only expectation but we’ll see) . I’ve seen a lot of people already complaining about it which is understandable. I don’t exactly hate the new skins, but it just feels off.

replies.body:
The fact they're all Vastayan suggests they're all from her home planet.

Zoe fits since she's delusional and obsessed with being sisters.

Yeah I feel like the execution is off too, mainly the over reliance on purple here for the corruption.  Causes them to look bland.  Their VOs are going to REALLY have to sell it for them to work.

I think that Morgana and Kayle should've replaced Rakan and Xayah tbh,  They would've fit equally well if not better with the same story base of one sacrificing them self for another.

> [{quoted}](name=Terozu,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=phbFEpU9,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-08-26T20:20:13.855+0000)
>
> The fact they're all Vastayan suggests they're all from her home planet.
> 
> Zoe fits since she's delusional and obsessed with being sisters.
> 
> Yeah I feel like the execution is off too, mainly the over reliance on purple here for the corruption.  Causes them to look bland.  Their VOs are going to REALLY have to sell it for them to work.
> 
> I think that Morgana and Kayle should've replaced Rakan and Xayah tbh,  They would've fit equally well if not better with the same story base of one sacrificing them self for another.

But where would Miss Fortune fit in shes the only surviving member from her old team?


Yeah Kayle and Morgana definitely would’ve been a better option here.

Yeah Sarah kind of fucks that up.

I couldn't really tell you.

where my urgot at

u had one job riot

> [{quoted}](name=Zeanix,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=phbFEpU9,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-08-26T20:05:59.934+0000)
>
>... and the fact that **Zoe** is the evil character, a character who is more chaotic neutral.
> 
> They had plenty of ‘villain’ choices, Morgana, Leblanc, Evelynn or even Lissandra. But you know, Zoe had to be the one. 

I never understand this point. If a champion already has skins that make them look like a villain... Why people ask for more? All those champions already have a "dark looking skin", why give it even more instead of trying something different?

Same goes to Zoe, she has skins where is the "happy good girl", so, a skin where she is evil is a good change.

I mean, look at Taric for an example, he had tons of "good" skins but people wanted to see a more "dark" version of the character, and due that, Bloodstone Taric was created.

> [{quoted}](name=Ebonmaw Dragon,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=phbFEpU9,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-08-26T21:26:36.123+0000)
>
> I never understand this point. If a champion already has skins that make them look like a villain... Why people ask for more? All those champions already have a "dark looking skin", why give it even more instead of trying something different?
> 
> Same goes to Zoe, she has skins where is the "happy good girl", so, a skin where she is evil is a good change.
> 
> I mean, look at Taric for an example, he had tons of "good" skins but people wanted to see a more "dark" version of the character, and due that, Bloodstone Taric was created.

I know there are a lot of champions with Dark Skins that are good guys, like Noxus Poppy and Dark star Karma. The execution of the skin is vital for it to work imo. This skin design however is just so out of a place, even for a corrupted guardian. I saw her as an actual Star Guardian, I don’t see her “fighting” the Star Guardians. I see her as a messenger for the First Light, like how she’s the pretty much the messenger for  Targon. We’re also seeing pretty much one of the “bad guys” of the skin line, and everyone was expecting something more. Instead we got Zoe, a champion that we don’t see as a villain of this skin line.

Like if it was Dark Star Zoe, I wouldn’t mind it one bit. 
Back when Zoe was released, I remember riot said that they were planning on Star Guardian as here release skin too. People did want a Star Guardian skin for her and there was even nice fan art for it as well. 
But her design here and her place in the skin line as a sort of a bad guy isn’t the best option here. 
I know the Star Guardian lore isn’t even out yet (or nor if there will be lore for this year since project didn’t have any) but again, it just felt off.

> [{quoted}](name=Zeanix,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=phbFEpU9,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-08-26T21:56:35.292+0000)
>
> I know there are a lot of champions with Dark Skins that are good guys, like Noxus Poppy and Dark star Karma. The execution of the skin is vital for it to work imo. This skin design however is just so out of a place, even for a corrupted guardian. I saw her as an actual Star Guardian, I don’t see her “fighting” the Star Guardians. I see her as a messenger for the First Light, like how she’s the pretty much the messenger for  Targon. We’re also seeing pretty much one of the “villains” of the skin line, and everyone was expecting something more. Instead we got Zoe, a champion that we don’t see as a villain of this skin line.
> 
> Like if it was Dark Star Zoe, I wouldn’t mind it one bit. But her design here and her place in the skin line as a sort of a bad guy isn’t the best option here.

Well... regular Zoe already looks like some kind of "Star guardian", so a normal Star Guardian skin for her would be... kinda redundant, but i get your point.

However, consider this: She did not get the legendary skin and we havent hear the lore of this new skins, so, it is possible that Zoe is not the "true" villain, and she may be just a messenger of the "real villain". But regarless of that, Zoe is far from being percieved as an "heroic" character, i mean, she is a trickster that basically killed a bunch of innocent guards in the lore with no problem, and a lot of users in game see her as an annoying character to deal with it in game.

Sure, she looks out of place in comparison with the Star Guardians, but that is because she is something totally different from the rest of them. A good comparison between the "evil" star guardians and the "good" ones is the Arcade Skin Line, where the "evil" Battle Boss skins dont look like the "good" Arcade skins.

Because 1350 rp skins dont change voice lines. so Zoe will now be skipping around cheering about mooncakes while trying to Corrupt all the Star Guardians. its the reason Jinx got the Legendary when it was her turn. you can't have a happy go lucky team witha  murderous sociopath on the team. Alot of her voice lines resemble the stereotypical enemy turned good trope in anime.

> [{quoted}](name=TStrm LastCaress,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=phbFEpU9,comment-id=00040001,timestamp=2019-08-26T22:57:48.036+0000)
>
> Because 1350 rp skins dont change voice lines. so Zoe will now be skipping around cheering about mooncakes while trying to Corrupt all the Star Guardians. its the reason Jinx got the Legendary when it was her turn. you can't have a happy go lucky team witha  murderous sociopath on the team. Alot of her voice lines resemble the stereotypical enemy turned good trope in anime.

I dont really see a problem with that... Sure, Zoe is happy about the things that she does... but nothing says that you cant enjoy doing bad things as an evil villain.

I mean hear her voice lines:

https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/2/26/Zoe.TauntResponse02.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20171109061403
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/8/84/Zoe.Unknown057.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20171109081801
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/9/98/Zoe.Unknown052.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20171109081405
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/a/af/Zoe.Unknown126.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20171109082905
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/b/b9/Zoe.Unknown053.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20171109081405
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/3/36/Zoe.Unknown076.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20171109082317
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/b/bc/Zoe.Unknown146.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20171109083105
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/2/27/Zoe.Unknown129.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20171109082907
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/c/cb/Zoe.TauntEzreal01.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20171109061217

She already IS a being that doesnt really care about destroying things (and even planets) for fun.

I'm sold, though I wished she was a legendary (aka I wish she had new voice lines) to really sell herself as the main/sub-villain of the skin line. Her base character can already be twisted into the quirky self-serving minion of the big bad with a couple tweaks to the context she exists in (all that would be necessary is for her to have the whole "Casually nuking a village" event in her color story to be revealed to have been more an act of pettiness rather then her simply forgetting that chucking a star at someone is infinitely more lethal then tossing a ball at them.

I think the problem with that is that unless the skin is legendary, the voice over will usually not change, meaning that you still have bloodstone taric running around and talking gently about protecting others, which kinda hurts the theme the skin is trying to tell.

Something else I just noticed. 

I assumed Neeko was yellow because of her abilities, but she's green.

All 3 of Ahri's old team are green in color scheme.
Instead of Blue Green and Yellow.

Wtf.

Zoe isn't really evil. From what I've heard (second-hand, so not completely accurate) she herself is also a corrupted Star Guardian that lost her old team and is now obsessed with gaining "sisters"...which she unfortunately does by corrupting them. Sure, she is the antagonist, but she's much more chaotic neutral like she is in her original Runeterran form; it just so happens her chaotic, self-serving behavior is directly antagonistic to heroes, in this case. It was an unexpected choice, but I think it works ok.

I think the idea for it was that the antagonists are corrupted star guardians.
Zoe being the aspect of change, is actually really fitting for an antagonist who corrupts others(changing them from light to dark, just like the twilight) and with her insane morality and lack of understanding, she can easily fill the role of a villain, just as well as a hero.

Rakan and Xayah are a bit more odd, I haven't heard their voice overs, but they do fit in a way, since they are rebels in their original lore, that try to change the system and thats pretty much what they are doing here too.
They rebel against the great star and want to kill the star guardians, so that they can be reborn just like them(I at least know that they have some lines talking about how they "died").
So essentially they are agents of "change" both in their regular lore, as well as the star guardian lore.
Also I kinda get team rocket vibes from them, Riot likely wanted a villainous duo, so using the duo-champs for that is kinda fitting.


Heck even Neeko kinda fits. In her regular lore she lost her home and is now trying to fit in/create her own tribe for those who don't fit into the society, this actually translates fairly well to the star guardians, where she lost her original team and got tainted by the darkness, thus not fitting with the other star guardians, but also not fitting with the evil guardians. Her touch of corrution can also explain why she is so weird compared to the others.


So while I'm not a big fan of these skins, I do think they were pretty much perfect for what riot was going for.
Also keep in mind that just because Zoe is the one corrupting others, doesn't mean that she is the big bad for the entire series, after all there had to be something that corrupted her first.

EDIT:
Also I feel like the corrupted guardians should get their own name, like Night guardians, to differentiate them from the regular ones.
I know that they had plenty of more upfront and obvious villain choices. But Zoe can be pretty evil. Zoe also matches very well with the theme of Star Guardians.
What about Jinx? She's human
They meant on Ahri's original team.  Miss Fortune, Ahri, Neeko, Xayah and Rakan are the original team that Ahri and MF came from.

I genuinely don't understand this logic, even from Rito standards. Morgana, though not necessarily an evil character either, fits the skin line more and has a body shape that doesn't stand out compared to other star guardian skins, already has a darker aesthetic to her theme and is also played a f*ck ton more than Zoe (16th highest overall pick rate compared to Zoe's 103rd).

Plus it would have suited the teaser that they had the throw back too saying "before her darkness burns you all away"

Morgana's kit in game is darkness that burns people.

Agreed. 

Star guardian Neeko is the only one that works for me there, in my opinion. Zoe, Xayah and Rakan could have worked as well, but with an "uncorrupted" version.

But honestly, I was disappointed when I saw the selected star guardian champs. I wanted so much a star guardian Zyra, who didn't have a skin since a long time.

Some artists made extremely great concept art with her, like : 

https://i.redd.it/qeti1ttu22c11.jpg

Otherwise, Star guardian Yuumi, Morgana, Kayle or Sona would have been a better choice for this theme.

But it's just my humble opinion. At least, some people would be happy with the new skins so nice for them.
I don't see  there is any problem with the champion selected.
